org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity

Class ImpurityHistogramsComputer<S extends ImpurityComputer<BootstrappedVector,S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.tree.randomforest.data.impurity.ImpurityHistogramsComputer<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - Type of basic impurity computer for feature.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GiniHistogramsComputer, MSEHistogramComputer

    public abstract class ImpurityHistogramsComputer<S extends ImpurityComputer<BootstrappedVector,S>>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Class containing logic of aggregation impurity statistics within learning dataset.

        nodesToLearn - Nodes to learn.

      • createImpurityComputerForFeature

        protected abstract S createImpurityComputerForFeature(int sampleId,
                                                      BucketMeta meta)
        Creates impurity computer in according to specific algorithm based on random forest (for example GiniHistogram for classification).
        Parameters:
        sampleId - Sample id.
        meta - Bucket Meta.
